DOC.brief_summary: This study compare two group subject complex abdominal aortic aneurysm . It compare clinical outcome quality life measure . The group treat study aneurysm repair endovascular approach use Zenith® Fenestrated AAA Endovascular Graft . This group compare group 461 patient ( historical cohort ) whose complex aneurysm treat open surgical repair .
DOC.brief_title: Complex Aortic Aneurysm Repair With Fenestrated Stent Grafts
DOC.criteria: General Inclusion Criteria A patient may include study patient least one follow appropriate treatment custommade Zenith® Fenestrated AAA Endovascular Graft : Juxtarenal , suprarenal type IV thoracoabdominal aortic aneurysm diameter ≥ 5.0 cm 2 time normal aortic diameter Aneurysm history growth ≥ 0.5 cm per year . Saccular aneurysms deem significant risk rupture base upon physician interpretation . General Exclusion Criteria Less 18 year age Unwilling comply followup schedule Inability refusal give inform consent patient legally authorize representative Pregnant breastfeed Life expectancy < 2years Additional medical restriction specify Clinical Investigation Plan Additional anatomical restriction specify Clinical Investigation Plan
